thought_categories.name: Perception
thought_categories.description: Processing sensory input from the environment
examples: I see a red car
That smells like fresh bread
The music sounds loud

thought_categories.name: Memory
thought_categories.description: Recalling past experiences or learned information
examples: I remember my first day of school
The capital of France is Paris
My phone number is...

thought_categories.name: Emotion
examples: I feel happy today
This situation makes me anxious
I'm excited about the upcoming event

thought_categories.name: Planning
examples: I need to buy groceries tomorrow
My five-year career plan is...
Let's schedule a meeting for next week

thought_categories.name: Problem-solving
examples: How can I fix this bug in my code?
What's the best route to avoid traffic?
How do I balance this equation?

thought_categories.name: Creativity
examples: What if cars could fly?
I have an idea for a new app
Let's combine these flavors in a unique way

thought_categories.name: Self-reflection
thought_categories.description: Introspection and analysis of one's own thoughts and behavior
examples: Why did I react that way?
I need to work on my patience
My strengths and weaknesses are...

thought_categories.name: Social cognition
thought_categories.description: Thoughts related to understanding and interacting with others
examples: I wonder what she meant by that
How can I explain this better?
He seems upset, I should ask if he's okay

thought_categories.name: Abstract reasoning
thought_categories.description: Considering hypothetical scenarios or complex concepts
examples: What would happen if gravity suddenly disappeared?
The nature of consciousness is...
How does quantum entanglement work?

thought_categories.name: Instinctive/automatic thoughts
thought_categories.description: Subconscious processes like regulating bodily functions
examples: I should blink now
My heart is beating faster
I'm breathing more deeply
